Description:
Walk to Train Station
You won't need a car when you buy this neat and spacious ground floor apartment which is only one of 10 on the block with its own carport on Title and conveniently located under 15 minutes walk to train station, Dandenong Plaza, Market, High School and many other central facilities.
It offers a large lounge huge master bedroom plus second bedroom with built in robes, combined bathroom/laundry, separate toilet and kitchen with meals area and gas cooking.
Other extras include extensive tiling, bright interior and front and rear security doors.
POSITION MATTERS!

Description:
721 Sqm Development Prospect in Highly Sought After Area
Located in one of central Dandenongs most sought after pockets, this property makes an outstanding development opportunity or long-term investment prospect.
The charismatic home boasts 3 bedrooms, formal lounge area with fireplace, combined kitchen and meals area, central family bathroom and good-sized outdoor verandah overlooking the vast backyard. Situated on a wide boulevard-style street, it is easy to understand why homes in this pocket of Dandenong have been so tightly held over the years.
A superb location, walking distance to all major amenities including Dandenong Plaza, St Marys Primary School, St Johns College, Dandenong CBD, restaurants, cafes and public transport.
This 721sqm block provides amazing development potential, retain and restore the existing dwelling, build in the backyard or start from scratch and construct high yield townhouses/units to rent out or resell (STCA).
This is truly an outstanding opportunity for any developer looking to commence their next project in an increasing market or long term investor aiming to reap the benefits of Dandenongs terrific capital improvement. Arrange to inspect before it is too late!
Contact: Neb Delibasic on 0411 332 467
Auction: Saturday 2nd November 2019 at 11:30am, On Site
Terms: 10% Deposit, Balance in 30-90 Days

Description:
Quality Family Home in Prime Location!
Beautiful inside and out, with a well thought out floor plan, this family home represents a great value opportunity well suited to young families and investors alike. Situated in a quiet family friendly area of Metro Village Estate, this home of superior design and remarkable quality, offers the ultimate in family living and entertaining.
This property offers a flexible floorplan with 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with ensuite plus a separate family bathroom. An expansive open plan living, dining and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboard space. Other fantastic features include LED Downlights, single garage, air-conditioning & heating.
Outdoor lovers and entertainers will appreciate the outdoor paved area which is perfect for entertaining family and friends. The front and backyard also have low maintenance gardens.
The location will not disappoint: Close to Dandenong Market, Dandenong Plaza, wide variety of eateries and public transport options with bus stops right out the front of the estate and numerous bus routes as well as being a short walk to the Dandenong Train Station. Additionally, Primary and Secondary Schools, including Dandenong High and Dandenong Primary are a short drive away.

Description:
A FAMILY FRIENDLY COURT LOCATED HOME WITH DUAL OCCUPANCY POTENTIAL (STCA)
If you're looking for your next investment, something to renovate or even a dual occupancy project (STCA), this court located home this home has something for everyone. Set on around 635sqm the largely original home has been kept in great condition throughout its life and a simple cosmetic renovation would instantly increase its value and there could still be room to add another unit in the backyard (STCA) to maximize the value of your investment. Features include polished hardwood floors and ducted heating throughout, a generous lounge, large meals area and a neat kitchen with upright oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as an updated bathroom, 2 toilets and a full laundry. Outside there's a big open backyard and a roller door that conceals a parking area and the single garage. Right near buses and Emerson School the home is also within minutes of St Gerards Catholic School, local churches and Dandenong High School with central Dandenong just minutes away.

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers, Investors & Down-sizers!
Introducing, a gorgeous two bedroom unit located on King George Parade, in the heart of Dandenong.
Nestled in the rear of a small group of units, this home offers a quiet, comfortable, private location for your living.
The cosy abode has no shortage of charm, with its neat little front yard and the classical brick-build facade. Brighten by the natural sunlight, the living area provides a great feeling of warmth and coziness, whilst the kitchen with its dry stone tiles is a well thought out plan that does not leave you desiring for more.
Featuring two generously sized bedrooms, the rooms are an idle size for rest and comfort that includes built in wardrobes.
A perfect cozy home for first home buyers, young families with ample room to grow or an investment in the ever popular city of Dandenong.
The surrounding amenities are all one can ask for. Both Dandenong Market and Dandenong Plaza a close drive away, walking distance to Yarraman station or bus stops, and with East Link access a stone throw away. This location has simply provided it all!
Don't miss out, this home won't last long!
Features:
• 2 Spacious Bedrooms
• 1 Bathroom, 1 Toilet
• Generous size formal living area
• Low maintenance front and backyard
• Tidy, neat kitchen with all basic necessities
• Remote garage for ease of vehicle access and parking
Photo ID required entering premise.

Description:
Location, Lifestyle And Low Maintenance Living
Level up with this lifestyle location in thriving Dandenong! Enjoy the easy living of an apartment lifestyle with the convenience of Dandenong CBD just around the corner.
Securely positioned on the first floor, the apartment's practical design comprises of a light filled living room, combined kitchen and meals area, two bedrooms with built in robes, a central bathroom with laundry amenities and a separate WC. Bonus extras include timber style flooring, a new wall heater, your own private balcony and covered off street parking within the complex.
Stroll to the iconic Dandenong Market or Dandenong Plaza for all your shopping needs, catch up with friends and family for coffee or cuisine at one of the many local cafes and restaurants, stretch your legs in the fresh air at Hemmings Park or utilize nearby bus transport, Dandenong Train Station, Princes Highway, Eastlink or the Monash Freeway to get you to where you need to be.
Move straight in, update the interiors to suit your taste or rent and relax; the choice is yours!
Insights: 6/3 Hemmings Street, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2019 and 124 other 2 bedroom unit in Dandenong have recently been sold.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY FOR INVESTORS AND DEVELOPERS...
Come on all investors or home buyers
We have a spacious 4 bedroom family home on 694m2 approx. This house is located in prime location of Dandenong, Currently rented at the movement, on top of that this has an approved planning permit calling for the original house to be demolished and you can have 2 townhouses and 1 unit to be developed on the site - either now or in the future. All the home work is done by the owner , Or you could easily just live in the home, which has great street appeal and build at the rear or simply just enjoy the big backyard on offer with lots of options!
This Brick veneer home itself features a great layout with 4 large bedrooms plus open dining area, spacious separate lounge room, central bathroom, updated kitchen with 900mm appliances and adjoining meals area, complete with polished timber flooring and new ducted heating. Great location, with all amenities at your fingertips including Yarraman Train station, Dandenong West Primary school, shops, bus, Dandenong CBD and easy Eastlink Access. Invest in your future! Inspect today!
Dont delay it wont last long
For more information or to make an appointment to inspect the property. Please call
Sudhakar Arunagiri 0420 998 259
Croy sia 0435888804.
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION).Please visit our website for similar kind of properties www.goldkeyre.com.au

Description:
Development Dual Occ Opportunity (STCA) in Prime Location!
Here is your opportunity to invest on this block of 605sqm approximately with plenty of options ripe for development or buy at today's prices and just keep it for a future project, live in or rent it out.
This is a perfect rectangular block in one of Dandenong's coveted locales and it is ready and waiting to be developed.
The original 3 bedroom home, kitchen, meals area bathroom, separate toilet laundry plus a storeroom is currently leased out.
Conveniently situated in a fantastic location with easy access to Monash and Eastlink interchange.
Close to all amenities such as local shops, Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Market, Yarraman/Dandenong stations, Dandenong High School, Dandenong Hospital, Primary and Secondary schools and so much more!
Call me now Great Dual Occ Opportunity in Prime Location! (STCA)
Terms: 10% Deposit. Balance 30/60 days.

Description:
Stunning house sized Villa
Flooded with natural light, this spacious single level villa offers a wonderful open and airy ambience that's ideal for the young family, downsizer or investor seeking low-maintenance living. Proudly boasting:
Spacious and functional open plan living, dining and kitchen area
Three bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite
Double remote lock up garage
Noted enhancements include ducted heating, split system air conditioning and fully landscaped front and back yard complete with the charming cubby house. Placed within walking distance to local primary and secondary schools and within easy rach of the Dandenong CBD and major arterials.

Description:
Immaculate First Home or Ideal Investment
Perfectly positioned to the rear of the property, and one of only four units on the block, this extra large unit is immaculately presented and you will be surprised at the size.
On offer are two bedrooms, both with double built in robes and wall to wall carpet, which are serviced by the central bathroom with separate toilet.
There is an open plan kitchen with gas stove and adjoining eat in meals area, flowing through to the extra large living room.
The property is currently tenanted at $1,477 pcm until March 2020, so would make an ideal investment or first home buyer's dream come true.
Extras include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, private rear court yard and single lock up garage.
OFFERS INVITED PRIOR TO AUCTION.
INSPECTION WILL IMPRESS THE FUSSIEST OF BUYERS.

Description:
Superb Ground Floor Apartment with Carpark!
Life does not get any easier than this gorgeous two bedroom ground floor apartment. In such a central position, you won't need a car as Dandenong central is at your fingertips. But inside this delightful apartment, you get to enjoy and open living and dining room with an AC unit that adjoins the kitchen. You also have direct access to the patio area. While tucked down the hallway are two good sized bedrooms, both with BIRs a central bathroom, powder room and separate laundry. If you want easy living in a prime pocket so close to the heart of Dandenong, make this the one for you.
Investors can reap the rewards of a solid investment as this contemporary apartment currently earns approximately $1304 per month. First home owners will love how you could easily move in and put up your feet with no work to do. Downsizers could comfortably call this home with minimal fuss. It's such a versatile home that it will suit all!
In such a great location you have everything at hand including the shops, bus stops, parks and much more. It's easy, it's a delight and now it can be yours. So call today before this gem is scooped up!

Fantastic Opportunity
This well presented home is situated in a prime position and is ideal for future development STCA on this perfect rectangular block 629m2. Description:
Price Reduced - Get on Board
Don't wait for the prices to go up! This is the perfect time to buy well and low in Central Dandenong.
Located just 650m from the Dandenong Plaza, this neat home offers a spacious lounge, large master bedroom and a second bedroom - both with built in robes, tidy kitchen, full bathroom and a carport.
Other features include gas cooking, gas heating, air conditioner and a ceiling fan.
Shopping, transport and many other facilities are all just a short walk away!
RIGHT TIME TO BUY!

Description:
Fantastic opportunity in a prime location!
One bedroom upstairs apartment in a prime location, situated in well recognized Dandenong Street offering comfort, low maintenance styling and maximum convenience .With all the benefits of apartment living including security access and undercover parking this brightly lit apartment is literally around the corner from the central Dandenong and all it has to offer.
Walking distance to Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Market, Transport and Schools.
Great opportunity for Investors!
Featuring:
- Living area with balcony
- Large bedroom with built in robe
- Separate meals area
- Separate bath, toilet and shower
- Undercover parking
- Security access
This is your opportunity to secure a successfully established rental investment with long term tenancy agreement till November 2020.
Internal area
59m²

Description:
Save $$$$ on Stamp Duty!
Fabulous opportunity to secure a brand new, quality built townhouse and save $$$ on Stamp Duty!
To be constructed and located in the very heart of Dandenong within 500 metres of the CBD, Plaza and Market where everything is at your fingertips.
Choose from five stylish townhouses. Each comprising of the bedrooms, family bathroom and full ensuite upstairs plus additional powder room on the ground floor. Downstairs features an open plan modern kitchen with stone benchtops adjoining the spacious living/meals area plus internal access to the lock up garage.
Extras include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, storage shed and a 2,000 litre water tank.
Four of the townhouses feature three bedrooms with a walk in robe to the master and a double garage with unit 3 having two bedrooms and a single garage.
GET IN QUICK!

Description:
RELAXED LIVING IN THE HEART OF DANDENONG!!
Ray White Dandenong is proud to present this fantastic opportunity for all First home buyers, downsizing and astute investors looking to be nestled in a highly sought-after pocket of Dandenong. This well-maintained home is within a short distance to all amenities and provides the convenient and ideal lifestyle you have been searching for.
For all investors out there, potential rental return is $300 - $330pw.
Offering high cathedral ceilings upon entry, 2 very good-sized bedrooms with BIR, a spacious family area, dining/meals area which is adjacent to the delightful kitchen equipped with electric cooking and an abundance of cupboard space. The main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry make up the interior of this lovely home.
This home also includes a spacious courtyard which is covered and has a separate entry which is ideal for all year round entertaining.
Features include: wall heater, courtyard, pergola,shared pool, common area, single lockup garage and much more.
Located close to Dandenong High School, Dandenong Hospital, Chisholm Institute, Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Market, public transport and major arterial such as Princes Highway, Eastlink and Monash. This gem will not last long.
With the location and features like these, we would highly recommend you act soon before you see a SOLD sticker on the board!!
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
